subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Only the top 10 drivers are likely to make the field for the Chase, where they will have their points reset, with the leader holding a five-point edge over the No. 2 qualifier.
snippet: Only the top 10 drivers are likely to make the field for the Chase, where they will have their points reset, with the leader holding a five-point edge over the No. 2 qualifier.
